      Source code for preprocess.examples.4_filter_and_split_files

      #!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import os
import subprocess
import sys

cmd_subfolder = os.path.abspath(os.path.dirname(__file__)).split(
    "pydeepgenomics")[0]
try:
    from pydeepgenomics.preprocess import settings, subsets, filtering
    from pydeepgenomics.preprocess.vcf import vcf
    from pydeepgenomics.tools import generaltools as gt

except ImportError:
    if cmd_subfolder not in sys.path:
        sys.path.append(cmd_subfolder)
    from pydeepgenomics.preprocess import settings, subsets, filtering
    from pydeepgenomics.preprocess.vcf import vcf
    from pydeepgenomics.tools import generaltools as gt


PATH_TO_PLAYGROUND = os.path.join(
    os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)),
    "playground")



      [docs]def example_4():
    subprocess.call(
        "python "+os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), "setup_ex_env.py"),
        shell=True)
    vcf.split_vcf_files(PATH_TO_PLAYGROUND, verbose=False)
    # list_chrs = gt.list_elements(
    #    PATH_TO_PLAYGROUND,
    #    type_="file",
    #    extension=".vcf.gz")
    # list_chrs = [os.path.basename(i).split(".")[0] for i in list_chrs]
    filtering.mask_data(os.path.join(PATH_TO_PLAYGROUND, "split_by_chr"), 0.1)
      


if __name__ == "__main__":
    example_4()
